description: COSESSIONDB files are located in "Sessions" folders in the Capture One directory on your computer. COSESSIONDB files replaced .COL , COL 60, COL50, and COL45 files, which were used by older versions of Capture One. These older files can still be opened by Capture One.

common_filenames.description: <session_name>.cosessiondb - This is the naming convention of COSESSIONDB files.
